alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Toole, Central, Eastern Pondera, Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 18 at 2:11AM MDT until August 18 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT TEMPERATURES, GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, AND A WIND SHIFT FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 112... * AFFECTED AREA...Eastern Glacier/Toole/Central/Eastern Pondera/Liberty. * TEMPERATURES...Around 90. * WINDS...West 35 to 45 mph, with gusts up to 60 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * IMPACTS...Any new fire starts could be difficult to contain. Additional details...A wind shift to the north will occur this evening.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Toole, Central, Eastern Pondera, Liberty
